name: fuzznuc2bsml
description: convert fuzznuc raw output to BSML

options.description: Input raw alignment file from an hmmpfam search.
Optional. If included, will make a seq data import element and include the defline with the sequences.
Optional. If given a non-zero value, will compress the output and give the output file a .gz extension. If the file already contains one, it won't add another.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
